name: Apple and Carrot Salad With Yogurt
recipeIngredient: 4 carrots (12 ounces), peeled and shredded (3 1/2 cups)
2 apples (12 ounces), left unpeeled but cored and cut into 1/4-inch sticks (3 1/2 cups)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the yogurt, vinegar, pepper, salt and cilantro in a bowl. Add the carrots and apples, and mix well. Cover and refrigerate for a few hours to soften the carrots slightly.
Serve the salad with crusty bread or spoon it onto lettuce leaves.
